description: Don't let the rain stop you from adventuring outdoors. The Kisa coat is a classic, waterproof, breathable, and stylish choice. Equipped with a hood and taped seams, it protects you from both wind and rain. Made from Bluesign®-certified polyester fabric, it respects the environment you love to explore. Layer it over a synthetic or down insulator for extra warmth on cool, wet days.
name: Kisa Rainwear Jacket - Womens
